content: {"name": "New Covenant Community Development Corporation", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Walkins are accepted but you will be required to wait until everyone who made an appointment via plentiful is served and therefore might miss out on some food.\n- Appoinments are made via plentiful.", "email": "", "url": "https://newcovenantdevelopmentcorp.org/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1175 Boston Road", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10456", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.828823, "longitude": -73.903717}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 328-6072", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}]}
